channel.title: iDigital
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from iDigital, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Social Security’s COLA could be lowest since 2021, pressuring seniors’ budgets
item.description: The 2026 Social Security cost-of-living-adjustment is projected to be 2.4%.

item.title: Trump should aim for zero tariffs. It could usher in a golden age for Americans.
item.description: How “tariff zero” would expand opportunities for American exporters and help U.S. companies sell to the world.

item.title: Shelter from inflation? CPI not showing much sign of it lately.
item.description: Rents and home prices aren’t going up like crazy anymore, but they are still one of the biggest sources of U.S. inflation.

item.title: Piaggio Fast Forward launches Star Wars licensed droid
item.description: Piaggio Fast Forward provides insights on its collaboration with Disney and Lucasfilm to design the Star Wars-themed G1T4-M1N1 robot. The post Piaggio...

item.title: Guardian agents: New approach could reduce AI hallucinations to below 1%
item.description: There are lots of ways to detect AI hallucination, new guardian agent model promises to correct them.

item.title: How trade wars and tariffs could put stock dividends on the chopping block
item.description: Companies will slash dividend payouts to make up for lost revenue.

item.title: The interoperability breakthrough: How MCP is becoming enterprise AI’s universal language
item.description: Just a few months after it's release, MCP adoption is growing. VentureBeat spoke to some enterprises asking why MCP is winning the standards race.

item.title: Sakana introduces new AI architecture, ‘Continuous Thought Machines’ to make models reason with less guidance — like human brains
item.description: While the CTM shows strong promise, it is still primarily a research architecture and is not yet production-ready out of the box.

item.title: Under Armour’s stock drops as company skips annual guidance due to uncertainty around trade and the economy
item.description: Sports apparel giant expects a slight first-quarter profit, while Wall Street was expecting a breakeven quarter

item.title: New fully open source vision encoder OpenVision arrives to improve on OpenAI’s Clip, Google’s SigLIP
item.description: A vision encoder is a necessary component for allowing many leading LLMs to be able to work with images uploaded by users.
